name: Goblin Massacre
description:
*Runs best on Firefox, otherwise the mouse cursor doesn't always show up. I recommend downloading the Windows version for an optimal experience.

The first game I've made - a small prototype/proof of concept for future projects.

I've used this project as a way to teach myself programming and learn the Godot engine. I'm still new to game development, and this project is still being worked on, so you can expect some bugs/weird things!

All art assets were created by myself. Environment art is super placeholder as I haven't spent much time on it yet.

 Sound and music were sourced from OpenGameArt.org.

Hope you enjoy and I'd love to hear your feedback! Cheers :>

Music credits:
Hitctrl

Kistol

Sound effect credits:
koertes
